✨ **Talk summary**

At **R/Medicine 2025**, Dacio Martínez and I had the opportunity to present our talk **"Optimizing Public Healthcare Cost Recovery with R"**, where we shared how we designed and implemented R-based pipelines to strengthen cost recovery processes within Argentina’s public healthcare system.

Our approach leverages robust **data warehousing** and **open-source tools**, building on the existing infrastructure of the **Health Information and Statistics Management Office** to provide timely, actionable information for administrative and financial management.
